title: Drawing, "Elevation of the section of a façade of a small palace", ca. 1750
medium: Pen and ink with ink and rose washes
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Horizontal rectangle. Three-storied façade with windows separated vertically by blind panels over a rusticated ground floor. Door, extreme right. Left portion of façade only. Ink framing lines.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Elevation of the section of a façade of a small palace", ca. 1750.Pen and ink with ink and rose washes. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1925-1-291.
